name: hurl
description: - uses pattern matching for routing - agnostic to where the user enters the app - deeplinks are supported via "intelligent hydration" - Not coupled to rendering/view, it's "just data" (mostly)

scripts.prep: npm run clean && mkdir dist && cp -r up.json dist
scripts.build: npm run prep && parcel build test/hurl/index.html -d dist  --no-source-maps --no-cache
